title: Google visual voicemail isn't loading
content:
Visual voicemail would not load messages.
This forum said to delete cache, which did not work.
This forum also locked the threads so I am unable to post the correct fix there.
I'm posting it here instead.
Go to phone app.
3 dots top right.
Settings.
Voicemail.
Turn off visual voicemail switch.
Tap "Turn off" after warning.
Wait a second or two.
Turn visual voicemail back on.

Please post this.
